Sql.CDATA: CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dbo.LUMTouchBistroDataReceivedV AS select a.CompanyID, uf.FileID, (select value from STRING_SPLIT(uf.name,'\') where value like '%.csv') as FileName, a.Subject as EmailSubject, em.MailFrom, em.MailTo, em.CreatedDateTime AS CreatedAt, uf.UsrIsImported AS IsImported from CRActivity a inner join NoteDoc nd on a.CompanyID = nd.CompanyID and a.NoteID = nd.NoteID inner join UploadFile uf on a.CompanyID = uf.CompanyID and nd.FileID = uf.FileID inner join SMEmail em on a.CompanyID = em.CompanyID and a.NoteID = em.RefNoteID where a.classID =4 and a.incoming = 1 and a.Subject like '%@@TouchBistro@@%' and Name like '%.csv'
